CustomField.formula: If( amc__Cost_Budget__c = 0, "No Measurement", if((( amc__Cost_Schedule__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c + amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c ) / amc__Cost_Budget__c)<0.8, "Under Project Budget", if((( amc__Cost_Schedule__c + amc__Material_Costs_Scheduled__c + amc__Anticipated_Project_Expenses__c) / amc__Cost_Budget__c)<=1, "Within Project Budget", "Over Project Budget")))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows performance based on Scheduled Hours & Material Costs & Anticipated Project Expenses
CustomField.label: Scheduled Performance
